entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of rain or snow after midnight then 40 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
